I'd highly recommend "Nine" for you, a musical film that features an ensemble cast including Fergie and Daniel Day-Lewis. The movie is based on the award-winning Broadway musical, and follows a troubled director as he juggles his professional and personal life while staging an extravagant production in Italy.

Alternatively, if you're interested in exploring a more indie-style musical, "Restless" might be up your alley. This film showcases the talents of Mia Wasikowska and Hayley Atwell, telling the story of two young people who form an unlikely connection during their last summer of freedom.
